title: "game has crashed pleas try to reconnect to the game"
body:
each time after champions selection countdown ends it fails to joins the loading screen and this message appears " game has crashed try to reconnect to the game " 
i was playing normally last night nothing installed or uninstalled i had about 20 normal game before this crashing happen 
pls help

replies.body: It sounds like your connection is failing to reach the game server after transitioning out of champion select.  You should go over each step in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Give it a go and let me know if you run into any issues.

i did follow all the steps in connection issues guide .... i can't change to wired connection cuz i use USP connection , for the firewall i did add exception for lol and tried to turn it off and i disabled avg protection restarted the pc not solve any firewall and avg is uptodate . i changed to google public dns still have the same problem . for the packet loss and buff.. that is the netalyzer report on pdf there is some stuff on red and yellow but not sure what that mean -snip- . for the port forwarding i try to use the default gateway on the url in my browser nothing happen like there is no such site . release and renew ip and flush dns i try that step too . and that is the Hextech Repair Tool logs
-snip-
hope you can help me on this . i try every thing i can nothing seems to be working

I've edited out your links because they can tend to have personal information in the logs.  I appreciate all the steps you tried, though it sucks the issue hasn't gone away.  In this case, grab those logs and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can work with you individually to see what the deal is.  We'll respond back as soon as we can!
